language.changedDescription: The language of Yoki has been changed to English (USA).

mute.title: You have been muted
mute.description: {{ target }}, you have been muted for %s minutes.
mute.targetDescription: <@{{ authorId }}>, you have successfully muted {{ target.user.name }} ({{ target.user.id }}).
mute.noRoleDescription: There is no mute role configured for this server.
mute.badDurationDescription: Your mute duration must be longer than 15 minutes.
mute.error: There was an issue muting this user. This is most likely due to misconfigured permissions for your server.

unmute.title: You have been unmuted
unmute.description: <@{{ target.user.id }}>, you have been manually unmuted by a staff member of this server.
unmute.targetDescription: <@{{ authorId }}>, you have successfully unmuted {{ target.user.name }} ({{ target.user.id }}).
unmute.error: There was an issue removing mute from this user. This is most likely due to misconfigured permissions for your server.

note.title: Moderation note added
note.description: <@{{ authorId }}>, you have successfully added a new moderation note on {{ target.user.name }} ({{ target.user.id }}).

warn.title: You have been warned
warn.description: <@{{ target.user.id }}>, you have been manually warned by a staff member of this server.
warn.targetDescription: {{ authorId }}, you have successfully warned {{ target.user.name }} ({{ target.user.id }}).
warn.error: There was an issue warning this user.

kick.targetDescription: {{ authorId }}, you have successfully kicked {{ target.user.name }} ({{ target.user.id }}).
kick.error: There was an issue kicking this user. This is most likely due to misconfigured permissions for your server.

ban.targetDescription: {{ authorId }}, you have successfully banned {{ target.user.name }} ({{ target.user.id }}).
ban.error: There was an issue banning this user. This is most likely due to misconfigured permissions for your server.
